Participant Consent Form

Thanks for taking the time to speak with us. This form relates to a research session conducted by 18F and the ways in which we may use the information that you provide.

Your participation in this session and any consent given is entirely voluntary. Please read this form carefully and ask any questions you may have before agreeing to take part in our project activities. For more information, review our statement of records notice, our privacy act statement, and our research principles and practices.

Consent

By signing this form, I give my permission for 18F to use (please initial next to all that apply):

Consent

Statement of Consent: I consent to take part in this interview and to have any information I provide be used in the manner described above. I understand that I will receive no compensation and waive all claims for compensation from the U.S. government in exchange for my participation in this research. I expressly release 18F from and against any and all claims that I have or may have for invasion of privacy, defamation, or any other cause of action arising out of the production, distribution, display, or publication of the results of the project, so long as they are used in the manner indicated above. I have read the above information and received answers to any questions I have asked.
